TEXT.TITLE: CANADIAN BASHAW, ERSKINE RESOURCES TO MERGE
TEXT.BODY: Canadian Bashaw Leduc Oil and Gas Ltd said it agreed to merge with Erskine Resources Ltd. Terms were not disclosed. Ownership of the combined company with 18.8 pct for the current shareholders of Canadian Bashaw and 81.2 pct to the current shareholders of Erskine, the companies said. Reuter
